body:
I'm pretty interested in sport and i know that with this many people from all over the world there must be a ton of people who do sport or some sort of physical activity.

I used to be very into competitive sports and play tons but it got quite boring and unrewarding after a while so i whittled it down to just basketball which i played fanatically for a year, which definitely paid off. But now alas i'm a gym lad and i still play basketball only twice a week now, my main source of fitness is bodybuilding and overall fitness.I've been going to the gym for about 5 months now and ya know some gains are getting through. ;P

I just wanted to share this and ask if anyone else in the community did sport and to what level, so share your sporting life, if there are any gym lads or lasses out there please do share, feel free to post pics, workout routines whatever if you're confident enough. Also any questions are welcome.
body_tagged:
I'm pretty interested in sport and i know that with this many people from all over the world there must be a ton of people who do sport or some sort of physical activity.

I used to be very into competitive sports and play tons but it got quite boring and unrewarding after a while so i whittled it down to just basketball which i played fanatically for a year, which definitely paid off. But now alas i'm a gym lad and i still play basketball only twice a week now, my main source of fitness is bodybuilding and overall fitness.I've been going to the gym for about 5 months now and ya know some gains are getting through. ;P

I just wanted to share this and ask if anyone else in the community did sport and to what level, so share your sporting life, if there are any gym lads or lasses out there please do share, feel free to post pics, workout routines whatever if you're confident enough. Also any questions are welcome.

replies.body:
Umm... I guess could be called athletic.

Plays two years up in soccer. Left winger.  Competes at a national level for my own age group. PDP, IDP, ODP.

Billiards, plays competitive 8-ball.

100M Sprint: 11.92 Pretty sweg.

Mile : 5:23

Baseball:  1st baseman and pitcher.Throws 72 mph.

Holds Multiple School Records.

(No Hate) (All info is real) (Not trying to make myself look good) (Im 13 come on)

replies.body:
Handler for an ultimate team (Probably first this year because our 2 op handlers graduated)

Under 5:00 mile, cross country since 7th grade

I used to be pretty good at breakdancing, but then I quit - here's a vid of me : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CyDY8XIv4hI

I was pretty good at badminton, played on school team (that has only lost 2 games in the past like 70) for 2 years but then I quit

As of now I'm mainly doing calisthenics. Here's a really neat read on Calisthenics vs Bodybuilding: http://www.collective-evolution.com/2015/02/26/why-i-stopped-lifting-weights-at-the-gym-and-do-this-...

replies.body:
I'm very competitive in most of the sports I take part in.

I'm most competitive in American football. I've been our school's Fullback for the football team since my Sophomore year, and there are currently 2 other Full/Halfbacks that are trying to take my position. I'm competitive against them, and out on the field.

I play baseball as well; I'm a pitcher.

I also take part in an Ultimate Frisbee league, which I love to do in my free time. It's a travel team, so we compete from state to state in tournaments. 

And I used to play soccer (5 years until I started football) and I wrestled a bit.
replies.body_tagged:

Soccer, fullback, Left or Right, it doesn't matter. Sometimes I play Goalie, I'm muxh better than the avg person who tries in net, but I pale in comparison to the ppl who play net ss their main position.

Basketball, usually SF or PF, since I have good acceleration,can drive hard and make good layups. I'm slightly taller than most ppl my age, but not too special. I don't play that often though.
